settings.label: Preorder Call to Action

settings.content: Please follow the instructions [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/getting-started-with-inventory/hide-out-of-stock#hide-out-of-stock-products-using-shopify-flow) to create a Shopify Flow to hide Products from Collections when all Variants are Out Of Stock

settings.label: Variant Metafield based Colors Swatches
settings.info: Format: 'namespace.key'. Metafield Namespaces need to be setup below to match the required metafield. DANGER: This can increase the load time of the entire site.

settings.content: DANGER: Hiding products with an override can lead to inconsistent results on collections and in search results, as Pagination is calculated before filtering the products.

settings.label: Metafield Namespaces
settings.info: Load additional metafield namespaces to allow for dynamic data to populate. DANGER: This can increase the load time of the entire site. Format: 'metafields.custom' or 'variants.metafields.custom'

settings.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/page-types#product-rating-block)
Important: Using custom metafields requires to load the Metafield data into the Product Data Modal via the `Product Data` Section.
Used for Individual Rating / Reviews Metafield

settings.label: Primary Image Source
settings.info: Choosing the Variant option will automatically show the Searched Variant on the Search Page or via Collection Filters.

options.label: Next Available Image after Variant (Color only)

settings.label: Add a drop shadow to the image
settings.info: Transparent images only

settings.content: You can setup custom labels via product metafields using `metafields.smart.product_labels` as a list of single line text.

settings.label: Discount Label type
settings.info: Shows when a product has a higher compare at price than the price field.

settings.info: The default fallback option for all choices is via the Product Option title and `swatches.json` setup.

settings.content: Matches Product Options containing "color" Values as highest priority
